entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
